54   | #define   DARKGRAY       8
55   | #define   LIGHTBLUE      9
56   | #define   LIGHTGREEN     10
57   | #define   LIGHTCYAN      11

64   |   Display Mode Atributes

66   | #define B4025  0                        /* black & white 40 x 25      */
67   | #define C4025  1                        /* color 40 x 25              */
68   | #define B8025  2                        /* black & white 80 x 25      */
69   | #define C8025  3                        /* color 80 x 25              */
70   | #define C320   4                        /* color graphics 320 x 200   */
71   | #define B320   5                        /* black & white graphics     */
72   | #define HIRES  6                        /* B&W hi res 640 * 200       */
73   | #define MONO   7                        /* monocrome 80 x 25          */
74   | #define COLOR  15                       /* General COLOR display mode */

140  | #endif
141  | 
142  | //#ifndef MK_FP
143  | //#define MK_FP(seg,off) ((void far *) (((unsigned long)(seg)<<16) | (unsigned)(off)))
144  | //#endif
145  | #ifndef FP_OFF
146  | #define FP_OFF(fptr) ((unsigned)(fptr))
147  | #endif
148  | #ifndef FP_SEG
149  | #define FP_SEG(fptr) ((unsigned)((unsigned long)(fptr) >> 16 ))
150  | #endif

152  | /*----------------
153  |   object flags
154  | ----------------*/
155  | #define NO_FLAGS   0x0000
156  | #define SELECTABLE 0x0001   /* Boolean, ON/OFF */
157  | #define DEFAULT    0x0002
158  | #define EXIT       0x0004
159  | #define EDITABLE   0x0008
160  | #define RBUTTON    0x0010
161  | #define LASTOB     0x0020
162  | #define TOUCHEXIT  0x0040
163  | #define HIDETREE   0x0080
164  | #define INDIRECT   0x0100
165  | #define SELECTED   0x0200
166  | #define CROSSED    0x0400
167  | #define CHECKED    0x0800
168  | #define DISABLED   0x1000
169  | #define EDIT_STR   0x2000
170  | #define HELP_ONLY  0x4000
171  | #define COMMENT    0x8000
172  | 
173  | /*----------------
174  |   window flags
175  | ----------------*/
176  | #define HIDDEN     0x0001
177  | #define SHADOW     0x0002
178  | 
179  | /*
180  | 
181  | 
182  |   (ulx,uly)€€€€€€€€€€€€€€€€€€€€€
183  |   €(x1,y1)                     €
184  |   €  |                         €
185  |   €<-|------ x-size ---------->€
186  |   €  |                         €
187  |   €  ysize                     €
188  |   €  |                         €
189  |   €  |                         €
190  |   €  |                  (x2,y2)€

195  | typedef struct wcb           /* Window control block                     */
196  | {                            /* ---------------------------------------- */
197  |   int wx1,wy1,wx2,wy2,       /* Coordinates of border of window          */
198  |       x1,y1,x2,y2,           /* Coordinates of writable part of window   */
199  |       xsize,                 /* width of window - inclusive border       */
200  |       ysize,                 /* height of window -inclusive border       */
201  |       ccx, ccy,              /* Screen cursor pos in window              */
202  |       wcolor,                /* window color                             */
203  |       bcolor,                /* border color                             */
204  |       btype;                 /* _NO_BORDER,_SINGLE_LINE etc              */
205  |   char *scrnsave;            /* pointer to screen save buffer            */
206  |   int  synflg;               /* cursor sync flag                         */
207  |   struct wcb *prev;          /* linked list - previous window            */
208  |   struct wcb *next;          /* linked list - next window                */
209  |   int  scroll_ok;            /* Scroll ok flag                           */
210  |   int  flag;                 /* SHADOWED                                 */
211  |   char *title;               /* Pointer to title                         */
212  |   int  monitor;              /* FIRST, SECOND                            */
213  |   int  page;                 /* Page window is in                        */
214  |   int  hideflag;             /* Flag indicating if window is hidden      */
215  |   int  level;                /* Level of window on desktop               */
216  | }
217  | WINDOW, *WINDOWPTR;
218  | 
219  | /*----------------------------
220  |   Menu structure definition
221  | -----------------------------*/
222  | typedef struct
223  | {
224  |   char   *header;
225  |   int    hotkey;
226  |   void   (*function)();
227  |   char   *help;
228  |   void   *data;
229  |   char   *format;
230  |   int    flags;
231  |   char   string[80];
232  | }
233  | MENU;
234  | 
235  | typedef int (*PFI)(void);
236  | 
237  | typedef struct
238  | { char *header;    /* Pulldown menu header            */
239  |   int  hotkey;     /* Hotkey of the header            */
240  |   int  number;     /* Number of menu's in the header  */
241  |   MENU *mptr;      /* Pointer to actual pulldown menu */
242  | }
243  | MENU_HEAD;

249  | /* MACRO definitions
250  | ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~*/
251  | #define clearone(row,col,att)        fillone(row,col,' ',att1)
252  | #define clearwindow(r1,c1,r2,c2,att) fillwindow(r1,c1,r2,c2,' ',att)
253  | 
254  | #ifndef max
255  | #define max(a,b) (((a) > (b)) ? (a) : (b))
256  | #endif
257  | #ifndef min
258  | #define min(a,b) (((a) < (b)) ? (a) : (b))
259  | #endif
260  | #ifndef minmax
261  | #define minmax(a,b,c)  (max((a),( (min((b),(c))) )))
262  | #endif

398  | #ifdef MAIN_WINDOW_MODULE
399  | 
400  | /*-----------------------------------------
401  |    Mask colors with 0x7F to avoid blinking
402  |    when working with monochrome monitor
403  | ------------------------------------------*/
404  | int    _menu_att       = (16*WHITE+BLACK)    & 0x7F,  /* memu item            */
405  |        _menu_hotkey    = (16*WHITE+RED)      & 0x7F,  /* hotkey of item       */
406  |        _menu_highlight = (16*BLACK+WHITE)    & 0x7F,  /* highlighted item     */
407  |        _window_att     = (16*BLACK+WHITE)    & 0x7F,  /* window attribute     */
408  |        _border_att     = (16*WHITE+BLACK)    & 0x7F,  /* border               */
409  |        _error_att      = (16*RED+YELLOW)     & 0x7F,  /* Error window         */
410  |        _disabled_att   = (16*WHITE+RED)      & 0x7F,  /* DISABLED item        */
411  |        _comment_att    = (16*WHITE+BLUE)     & 0x7F,  /* COMMENT item         */
412  |        _dialog_att     = (16*WHITE+BLACK)    & 0x7F,  /* Dialog menu          */
413  |        _desktop_att    = (16*BLUE+YELLOW)    & 0x7F,  /* Dialog menu          */
414  |        _help_text      = (16*WHITE+BLACK)    & 0x7F,  /* help text            */
415  |        _help_bold      = (16*WHITE+RED)      & 0x7F,  /* bold help text       */
416  |        _help_border    = (16*WHITE+BLACK)    & 0x7F,  /* help border          */
417  |        _help_topiclink = (16*WHITE+LIGHTBLUE)& 0x7F,  /* topic link text      */
418  |        _help_linkselect= (16*WHITE+RED)      & 0x7F;  /* selected topic link  */
419  |

434  | int monitor    = MONITOR_1;     /* Current monitor output to 1st monitor */
